detail_desc: Longer blouse in lightweight, softly draping twill with a sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long-sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Vest top in a soft, ribbed cotton and viscose blend with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery motif on the front and gathered frills over the shoulders.
Fully lined, low-cut swimsuit with adjustable shoulder straps and an integral bra with padded cups, space for breast forms and an elasticated hem.
Cropped crocheted top in soft cotton with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.

Short dress in chiffon with broderie anglaise and a small frilled collar. V-neck opening with ties at the front, a gathered yoke at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a frill trim at the hem. Jersey lining.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a square neckline, smocking at the top and a flared skirt.

Jacket in a crisp weave with a lined hood, high collar and elastic drawstring. Zip down the front and front pockets with a concealed zip. Long sleeves with covered elastication and an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Nightslip in woven fabric with a lace trim at the top, V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short satin nightslip with lace at the top, a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, fitted jacket dress in a crêpe weave with peak lapels, a wrapover front with a concealed fastening and a detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the top with a sewn-on bow and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Trousers in soft, stretch twill with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with faux fur details, open sides and pointed toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that tie at the base of the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, straps at the sides and a high cut at the back.

Lined shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a reflective strip on each leg, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves, front pockets and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Print-patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Knee-length skirt in velour with an elasticated waist with ties and slits at the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Fully lined, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, soft jersey on the inside of the chin and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, and elastication at the waist and cuffs. Longer at the back with a small vent. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
T-shirt in soft, airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a round neck and straight hem.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Shorts in twill made from a cotton and linen blend with a high paper bag waist, visible buttons at the front, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Polo shirt in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket, embroidered detail on the chest and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Knee-length shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees.
Fitted thong body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves and elastication with a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.

Playsuit in jacquard-patterned jersey with decorative buttons at the front and long sleeves. Sewn-in wrapover at the front that conceals the short legs. The polyester content of the playsuit is recycled.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, decorative seam down the front, gathered, front-facing shoulder seams and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets, zipped leg pockets and flap back pockets. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved T-shirt in waffled cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Scarf in a soft, pleated, patterned weave.
Knee-length chino shorts in stretch organic cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Detachable elastic braces.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Treggings in soft, stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Satin-covered Alice band with decorative braiding.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Sleeveless top in airy, crinkled chiffon with broderie anglaise and a small opening at the top and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Flared with gathers for added width. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves that taper to the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a seam at the hem.
Transparent, glittery shopper in soft plastic with a detachable keyring. Two handles at the top and a print motif on the front. Depth 7 cm. Width 31.5 cm. Height 28 cm.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Top in cotton jersey with a wider neckline, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves with a flounced trim.
Tiered skirt in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Medium coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Suede court shoes with open sides and pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Vest top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Jersey hat with a thermal fleece lining.
Short, wide top in crushed velvet with a V-neck front and back.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings. Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliquéd print motifs above the hems.
Oversized, straight-cut T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Waist belt in imitation leather with decorative antiqued metal buckles. Elastication at the back and a metal fastener.

Two-button jacket in twill containing some linen with notch lapels, a welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Unlined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with a twisted detail at the front. Lined.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Dress in a softly draping viscose weave with decorative frills. Stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and wide, close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
